means: 不可能（性）( impossibility的名词复数 )
不可能的( impossible的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Faith must be dead to doubt, clumb to discouragement impossibilities.
sentence.Network_cn: 信念就是对怀疑, 沮丧和不可能的一概否定.

sentence.Network_en: Can you just stop thinking about all those impossibilities, girl?
sentence.Network_cn: 你能不能别尽想这些不切实际的东西, 女孩?

sentence.Network_en: Impossibilities vanish when a man and his God confront a mountain.
sentence.Network_cn: 当人与他的神一起挑战崇山峻岭,不可能的事就会消失.

惊天巨啸(The impossible),不错的片子；母侵(MAMA),片子一般，纸套出色，封面及中脊处的片名都是凹字，局部银卡的设计锦上添花…

entry.def: Something that is impossible cannot be done or cannot happen.

example.ex: It was impossible for anyone to get in because no one knew the password...
example.tran: 因为没人知道密码,所以任何人都不可能进得去。

example.ex: He thinks the tax is impossible to administer...

entry.def: An impossible situation or an impossible position is one that is very difficult to deal with.

example.ex: The Government was now in an almost impossible position.
example.tran: 政府现在几乎陷入了进退维谷的境地。

entry.tran: 难以忍受的;让人受不了的
entry.def: If you describe someone as impossible, you are annoyed that their bad behaviour or strong views make them difficult to deal with.

example.ex: The woman is impossible, thought Frannie.
example.tran: 弗兰妮想,这个女人真让人受不了。

auth_sentence.content: Then the Materialists wonder why they keep banging into impossibilities.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then the Materialists wonder why they keep banging into impossibilities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then the Materialists wonder why they keep banging into impossibilities.

auth_sentence.content: Nothing is improbable; it is the impossibilities that open opportunities.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nothing is improbable; it is the impossibilities that open opportunities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nothing is improbable; it is the impossibilities that open opportunities.

auth_sentence.content: What occupies my mind is impossibilities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What occupies my mind is impossibilities.
